Washington #25 Olivier-Maxence Prosper #8 Full Roster Mavericks Quick Links Stats Schedule Roster NBA Quick Links Scores Standings Schedule Previous Game Full Splits NBA Play-In - West - 8th Seed Game Mavericks 39-43 106 Final Grizzlies 48-34 120 Winner Icon Memphis Grizzlies Latest News See All Racing Positions Sources: Mavs shutting down Flagg for summer 1d Harper's Spurs top Flagg's Mavs at summer league 2d Michael C. Wright Scouting Cooper Flagg's first summer league game: Top plays, takeaways and… 4d NBA insiders Flagg makes 'winning plays' in uneven debut 4d Tim MacMahon Fantasy Men's Basketball Fantasy Home Position Rank 0 % Rostered 87.9 % Change 7 Days 9.5 News : 1 day ago Flagg (not injury related) will be shut down for the remainder of Summer League, Mike Curtis of The Dallas Morning News reports. Spin : Flagg showcased his two-way versatility and scoring ability during his two Summer League appearances, averaging 20.5 points, 5.0 rebounds, 2.5 assists, 1.5 steals and 1.0 blocks across 31.5 minutes per game. The No. 1 overall pick in the 2025 NBA Draft will now shift his focus to preparing for the 2025-26 campaign, when he's expected to serve as a centerpiece for Dallas immediately.
